short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension saves Tweet to Notion page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension saves Tweet to Notion page.  Check out the "How to setup Mark To Notion" video for easy one time setup.

Step 1: Log in to Notion and click on "Setting and members" to create a new integration.

Step 2: Create Integration and copy the API key. This key is required in the plugin.

Step 3: Create a new page "Twitter Bookmark" and add the connection.

Step 4: Paste the Notion key into your "Mark To Notion" popup and click on the key icon to save the key. (This is one time setup)

And that is it. You are ready to save tweets into this Notion page. Enjoy!!
